fields.title: Coastal View with Lilies
fields.description: A vibrant canvas piece depicting a tranquil coastal scene viewed through an arched window. The foreground flowers were added to the canvas, while the rest of the scene was painted freehand.

fields.title: Cocktail Bar Scene
fields.description: A stylish mural capturing the atmosphere of a cocktail bar, inspired by artists like Rihanna and Daft Punk. Perfect for adding a modern, musical vibe to any space.

fields.title: Guardian Angel Mural
fields.description: A powerful mural of a guardian angel, painted on an exterior wall for a private residence. The piece is designed to be a striking and protective presence.

fields.title: Music for the Jilted Generation
fields.description: A dynamic and gritty piece inspired by the iconic album cover for The Prodigy's 'Music for the Jilted Generation.' This mural captures the raw energy of the original artwork.

fields.title: Marilyn Monroe Portrait
fields.description: A classic black and white portrait of Marilyn Monroe, painted for a local dance studio. This piece captures her timeless elegance and iconic look.

fields.title: Beauty and the Beast
fields.description: A whimsical depiction of Lumi√®re and Mrs. Potts from Disney's Beauty and the Beast. This playful mural was created to add a touch of magic to a dance studio.

fields.title: Castle on the Cliff
fields.description: A dramatic, monochromatic mural of a castle perched on a cliffside. This atmospheric piece was designed to create a unique and imaginative feature wall within a dance studio.

fields.title: Stairway to Heaven
fields.description: An ethereal landscape mural painted for a small business in Tasmania. The piece, titled 'Stairway to Heaven,' creates a serene and dreamlike pathway on a large exterior wall.

fields.title: Mind of a Dancer
fields.description: A vibrant and conceptual mural illustrating the different styles and disciplines of dance exploding from a creative mind. Painted for a studio to inspire energy and passion.
